name: Gas Dash
description:
**  This game was made in 72 hours for the MashUp Game Jam 2 **

Description

Dave has found himself on quite the awkward first date. Unfortunately for him, he has forgotten to take his extreme lactose intolerance medication, to disastrous consequences.
Join Dave on his unconventional journey to make it to the restroom!

Credits

- MrSerp - programming, level design, art, sound effects
- Validbit - soundtrack

Controls

- Hold LMB and aim to move
- Escape to exit
- R to reset current level
